main event: Tech. Sgt. Billy Ross Hughes observed five or six unidentified circular objects circling in the sky near Denver, Colorado on 24 September 1952.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be very bright white in color and had no trails., The sighting lasted for approximately five to six minutes., The observer was located in the business district of Aurora, about eight miles east of Denver., The speed of the objects was compared to that of a jet passing 500 feet overhead., Two C-47 aircraft passed through the line of sight during the observation.
sighted object: five or six unidentified circular objects
witness description: Tech. Sgt. Billy Ross Hughes from Lowry ATB
